title: [Mayhem] 8a crashes with exit status 139
body:
by **mstplbrg**: 
This is reproduced with go version go1.1.1 linux/amd64 and reported originally at
http://bugs.debian.org/715578

When running ./crash/crash.sh from the attached report tarball, 8a crashes.
Attachments: 1. 8a-report.tar.bz2 (31749 bytes)
